citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection
process at 11:45 PM on 06/12/2014. The facility has been contacted and a backup inspection host has been
designated.
